ScriptExtension.Name: VideoRecorder
ScriptExtension.Author: SmartBear Software

RuntimeObject.Name: VideoRecorder
RuntimeObject.Method: Starts a video recording session. Returns the video file name. VideoQuality = a string that specifies the video quality: "Low", "Normal" (default), or "High".
Stops the video recording session. Returns the video file name.
Returns true if the recorder is working, or false otherwise.
RuntimeObject.Description: Records a .mp4 video of a test run. Uses the VLC video recorder.

Column.Name: Description
Column.Value: Starts a video recording session. Returns the video file name. The recorded video will be saved to the <your-project>\Logs folder.

Column.Name: Description
Column.Value: Stops a video recording session. Returns the video file name. You can find the recorded video in the <your-project>\Logs folder.

ScriptExtension.Description: Provides keyword-test operations and a script object for video recording of test runs.
